title: gbm-cart-spatial-model: Spatial Fractional Reaction-Diffusion Model for Optimizing CAR-T Therapy in Glioblastoma
description: Computational framework integrating fractional diffusion, tumor microenvironment barriers, and switchable CAR-T dynamics for glioblastoma immunotherapy optimization. Includes validated model code, sensitivity analysis, statistical testing, and publication-ready analysis suite. NonCommercial license (CC BY-NC-SA 4.0) - commercial use requires separate licensing agreement.
notes: Code validation and publication infrastructure assisted by Claude (Anthropic AI). Core mathematical model, parameter derivation, and scientific interpretation by Cassandra D. Harrison.
